short_summary: Farm Credit Canada is seeking economic expertise to measure the economic impact of various lending initiatives leveraging Statistics Canada's input/output tables.
description: This is a competitive RFP for a service contract. The contract duration is not specified. All proposals are due by March 17, 2023. The RFP is seeking economic expertise to build a simple empirical framework that can assess the economic impact of lending initiatives. The framework should be able to assess the impact in terms of GDP and jobs created by region/province and sector (i.e., broken down by NAICS codes). The framework should also be adjustable to reflect Statistics Canada updates to its input/output tables over the years.
